# index(before:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the position in the sequence of the weight that preceeds the given position.

## Declaration

```swift
func index(before i: BlendShapeWeights.Index) -> BlendShapeWeights.Index
```

## Discussion

For more on calculating indices, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Array/index(before:)].
